body: Suggested one more minor change to Pike language but approving as it stands now so as not to appear nit picky.

Example of wrapping:
![Screen Shot 2019-03-21 at 2 51 31 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4983409/54780977-1eefb580-4be9-11e9-92ec-4e22a134a19c.png)
Example with a narrower window:
![Screen Shot 2019-03-21 at 2 51 50 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4983409/54780988-21520f80-4be9-11e9-92fd-8d50ea4198bf.png)
The formatting issue with the bulleted list margin will be handled in a separate PR.
What's the context around this change?

This should fully implement the use of the nightly docs build mentioned in [d848f5d](https://github.com/hyperledger/grid-website/commit/d848f5daaf5c65eb429e19ba885bf70841244802), where line being removed were added.

@peterschwarz, the change from using the supply-chain docs to the grid repo nightly docs left this symlink creation is place, creating a broken symlink.
Jenkins fails when zipping artifacts with broken links. The change should have been in place earlier, but was not noticed until deployment broke.
Good context; could probably go in the commit message
